SVGMaskElementWidth.summary: The read-only width property of the interface returns an object containing the value of the {{SVGattr("width")}} attribute of the {{SVGElement("marker")}}.

blockquote.para: Note: Although this property is read-only, it is merely a container for two values you can modify, and .

SVGMaskElementWidth.value: An object. The baseVal property of this object returns an , the value of which returns the width value.
